mapper.insert: insert into t_store (storeName, storeDistrict, storeAddress, mobile, contactName, status, userId, createTime) values (#{storeName}, #{storeDistrict}, #{storeAddress}, #{mobile}, #{contactName}, 0, #{userId}, now())
mapper.select: select * from t_store where storeName = #{storeName} and status = 0
select * from t_store where storeName = #{storeName} and storeId != #{storeId} and status = 0
mapper.update: update t_store set storeName = #{storeName}, storeDistrict = #{storeDistrict}, storeAddress = #{storeAddress}, mobile = #{mobile}, contactName = #{contactName}, status = 0, userId = #{userId} where storeId = #{storeId}
mapper.select: select * from t_store where status = 0 and storeId = #{storeId}

select * from t_store where status = 0
and storeName like CONCAT("%", #{storeName}, "%")
order by createTime desc
mapper.update: update t_store set status = 1 where storeId = #{storeId}
